munit:config.name: list-appointments-test-suite.xml
munit:config.doc:description:
As part of this test suite I would like to test below scenarios
1. Given patient id, Verify the patient exists. 2. Given valid patient id, Verify the response contains list of appointments. 3. Given valid patient id, Verify the response as per the defined schema 4. Given invalid patient id, Verify the the response status code
